mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.zxlx AS "zxlx", a.wtnr AS "wtnr", a.danr AS "danr", a.twrq AS "twrq", a.hdrq AS "hdrq", a.yx AS "yx", a.dh AS "dh", a.sfxs AS "sfxs", a.lyip AS "lyip", a.tw_owid AS "twOwid", a.tw_name AS "twName", a.hf_owid AS "hfOwid", a.hf_name AS "hfName", a.zxzyid AS "zxzyid", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_zxzx( owid, zxlx, wtnr, danr, twrq, hdrq, yx, dh, sfxs, lyip, tw_owid, tw_name, hf_owid, hf_name, zxzyid, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{zxlx}, #{wtnr}, #{danr}, #{twrq}, #{hdrq}, #{yx}, #{dh}, #{sfxs}, #{lyip}, #{twOwid}, #{twName}, #{hfOwid}, #{hfName}, #{zxzyid}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_zxzx SET owid = #{owid}, zxlx = #{zxlx}, wtnr = #{wtnr}, danr = #{danr}, twrq = #{twrq}, hdrq = #{hdrq}, yx = #{yx}, dh = #{dh}, sfxs = #{sfxs}, lyip = #{lyip}, tw_owid = #{twOwid}, tw_name = #{twName}, hf_owid = #{hfOwid}, hf_name = #{hfName}, zxzyid = #{zxzyid}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
UPDATE bckj_biz_zxzx SET DANR=#{danr} , hdrq=now() ,state= #{state} ,exp1=#{exp1} WHERE owid =#{owid}
update bckj_biz_zxzx set exp1=#{exp1} where owid =#{owid}
mapper.select: SELECT b.dic_val2 FROM ourway_sys_dic a ,ourway_sys_dic_value b WHERE a.owid=b.dic_ref_owid AND a.type=60000
